resources.string:
Sam Huebschwerlen
Project 5

This Appointment Book Application can perform several functions: 

 – Add Appointments: 
 1) Select Add Appointment Button From Main Screen 
 2) Enter Information And Select Add Appointment Button 


 – Search For Appointments: 
 1) Select Search Appointment Button From Main Screen 
 2) Enter Owner And Begin And End Time To Find 
 Appointments Beginning Between Said Times 
 3) Then Select Search Appointments Button 


 – View All Appointments: 
 1) Select View All Appointments Button From Main Screen 
2) Then Enter Owners Names And Select View Button 



Date and time should be in the format: 
mm/dd/yyyy hh:mm am/pm 
End Time Can Not Be Before Begin Time

 

If the owner entered does not exist the application will attempt to create a new appointment book for owner to save appointments to.
